title: Ticket #4956: files in EXECUTE LOG & SPOOL subject to removal
description:
Any files not created by HTCondor in the directories specified by configuration variables EXECUTE, LOG, and SPOOL are subject to removal.

This needs to be documented, probably in the installation instructions as well as in the definition of the configuration variables.
check_ins: 2015-Mar-24 14:55   Check-in [43695]: Don't place other files in LOG, EXECUTE, or SPOOL, as they are subject to removal. #4956 (By Karen Miller )
creator: smoler
